FAEMA FAMILY
 
With the new, elegant and refined Faema Family model, Faema transforms the family espresso machine into a machine characterized by high performance. The Faema Family allows you to obtain a perfect cup of espresso and cappuccino that taste exactly like those prepared by a commercial machine due to its professional filter holder. The Faema Family technology enables you to have the right water temperature and pressure, which are required to extract the full coffee flavor. It also enables you to prepare a frothy cappuccino thanks to its high performance steam wand, and dispenses hot water for tea.
A practical base, featuring a coffee grounds drawer with filter bumper, and a high performance grinder are available as options.
   
   
TECHNICAL DATA
COFFEE MACHINE
Tank Capacity 1.5 liters (35cups)
Voltage 110V, 60 Hz
Absorption 1180W
Dimensions (cm) (WxDxH) 25.5x24x38.5
Weight (kg) 8.5
Colours available black, silver
COFFEE GRINDER
Bean hopper capacity 150 gr
Ground coffee container capacity 100 gr
Voltage 110V, 60 Hz
Absorption 130W
Dimensions (cm) (WxDxH) 25x25x34
Weight (kg) 5.6
BASE
Dimensions (cm) (WxDxH) 49x28x7
Weight (kg) 2.6
The manufacturer reserves the right to modify the appliances without further notice.
